short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlimited number of mailboxes. Ability to create your own mailbox or use existing ones. Instantly receive mail and fight spam.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Online email for different needs. Protect your primary email from spam and receive emails for temporary mail. You can also use your domain and make permanent mail without any registrations. 

Main features:
- Unlimited number of email.
- Large number of domains.
- Notification of new email.
- Your own email name.
- Your own email domain.
- There are no spam and viruses.
- The email is displayed immediately without delay.
